document_data.name: Yarsabras
document_data.mainbody: '''Yarsabras''' was an exiled [[archdevil]] in the mid-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Appearance: He had many talons, and a hound's head.
document_data.History: During the scouring of [[Avernus]] by [[the Simbul]] in {{yearlink|1372}}, she moved into a cave that was held by [[Yarsabras]]. The exile emerged to attack her, but overshot her and leapt into the forces fighting her; rather than ignore each other, they got into a tussle.
